text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include all codes defined in http://jpfhir.jp/fhir/core/CodeSystem/JP_MedicationCategoryMERIT9_CS
  • Include all codes defined in http://jpfhir.jp/fhir/core/CodeSystem/JHSP0007
  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0482

name: JP_MedicationCategory_VS
title: JP Core Medication Oral/External Category ValueSet
publisher: FHIR Japanese implementation research working group in Japan Association of Medical Informatics (JAMI)

contact.name: FHIR Japanese implementation research working group in Japan Association of Medical Informatics (JAMI)

description: 内服・外用の処方区分コードの値セット
